Sceptre of Corruption

one handed weapon (lvl 8 - unique)

item id [id]: 139
horrormark chance [taint]: 10%
spell [itemspell]: #564 Bane Fire
leadership [ldr-n]: +50
(unremovable [cursed])
weap id [weapon]: 172 (Magic Sceptre)
attack [att]: +1
length [len]: 1
nbr of attacks [nratt]: 1
 
(Bludgeoning Damage [blunt], Magic weapon [magic])

Requires 25B to forge (B4)

This unholy sceptre was the sign of office of the Great Sarlah. It allowed him to rule the living as well as his usual servants. Apart from its powers of domination, it allows its wielder to project unholy Bane Fire upon those who dissatisfy him.
